info.task: read information about grid cell containing link
info.title: Read information about a grid cell containing a link in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstLinkedCell
setupScript.description: sets focus on the third cell of the second row in the grid

user: With the reading cursor on a cell containing a link in the grid, read information about the cell.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on a cell containing a link in the grid, read information about the cell.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Text of the column header ('Description') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 3, row 2) are conveyed
